gamerules.cashAward1: 3 SCATTERS = A random multiplier from 10 to 100x total bet
gamerules.cashAward2: 4 SCATTERS = A random multiplier from 20 to 250x total bet
gamerules.cashAward3: 5 SCATTERS = A random multiplier from 30 to 500x total bet
gamerules.wildRules: This symbol is WILD and substitutes for all symbols except for BONUS. Wild symbol appears in all reels.
gamerules.scatterRules: This symbol is BONUS, get 3 or more to enter bonus game.
